scripts.heroku-cleanup: rm -rf .next/cache && find node_modules/@next -depth -maxdepth 1 -type d -name 'swc*' -exec rm -rf {} \; -prune && find node_modules/@swc -depth -maxdepth 1 -type d -name 'core-win*' -exec rm -rf {} \; -prune && find node_modules/@swc -depth -maxdepth 1 -type d -name 'core-android*' -exec rm -rf {} \; -prune && find node_modules/@swc -depth -maxdepth 1 -type d -name 'core-darwin*' -exec rm -rf {} \; -prune
